review: Easy install, easy to link to netflix, youtube, apps, etc.

review: Finally- I can watch my Amazon Prime TV and movies via my TV... and not have to sit in front of the computer screen... 55" screen is much better than the 20" monitor!!

review: Love my fire stick. Fast! And because it is a HMDI dongle no clutter!

review: Just learning on how to use it. Seems cumbersome to get out the TV remote to change the input. Then change it back to watch tv

review: Very pleased with the quality and the service. Easy hook up. Provides immediate instructions and videos to assist during the setup phase.
